share.whatsappText: Join me on NuVantage India — this is my invite link:

m2.title: Mission 2: Help 3 Hit 10
m2.subtitle: Get 3 of your Level 1 leaders to reach 10 personal enrollments

m3.title: Mission 3: Build L2 Leaders
m3.subtitle: Find 3 Level 2 leaders who each reach 10 personal enrollments

helpSteps.1: Copy your referral link or use the QR to invite.
helpSteps.2: Ask new partners to register with your Sponsor ID.
helpSteps.3: Follow up and help them invite their first 10.
helpSteps.4: Watch the training and complete the checklist.
helpSteps.5: Track progress here and celebrate wins.

m1.suffix: more this month to hit Mission 1. You need {need}.

hero.m2: Help <needStrong>{need}</needStrong> of your L1 leaders reach <s>10</s> each.
hero.m3: Find <needStrong>{need}</needStrong> leaders at L2 with <s>10</s> each.
hero.done: Fantastic! You’ve completed all three missions.

errors.profileLoad: Could not load your profile. Please refresh.

prelaunch.title: Pre-Launch Training
prelaunch.subtitle: Watch the slides, complete the checklist, and mark this module done.

steps.2: Send your invite message with your link
steps.4: Book a call with your sponsor

errors.load: Could not load your training progress.

prelaunch.gamma.title: Training Slides
prelaunch.gamma.missingSrc: No slides to show. Please add a share URL to the src field.
prelaunch.gamma.tip: Tip: Use the arrow keys to move between slides.

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Enter your sponsor’s ID and your details to register.

hints.needSponsor: Don’t have a Sponsor ID? Ask the person who invited you.
hints.phoneSavedAs: Your phone will be saved as

reminders.intlPayout: If you’re not an Indian National, commissions are paid via your Nu Skin account in your country of residence.

notices.uplineNotFound: ❌ Sponsor not found. Please check the ID.

errors.uplineCheck: Could not verify the sponsor ID.
errors.validUplineRequired: Please verify a valid sponsor first.
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
errors.passwordPolicy: Password must have 8+ chars, 1 uppercase, and 1 number.
errors.panInvalid: Please enter a valid PAN in the format AAAAA9999A.
errors.selectResidence: Please select your country of residence.
errors.nuskinIdRequired: Nu Skin ID is required for international participants.
errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists.
errors.phoneExists: An account with this phone already exists.
errors.panExists: This PAN is already used by another account.

errors.invalidEmailForReset: Enter a valid email to reset your password.
errors.userNotFound: We couldn't find an account with that email.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Try again later.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.sponsorNote: Don’t have a Sponsor ID? Ask the person who invited you.
